name: Bon☆Guys
description:
NOTE: Click the dialogue box to accept packages and buyers.

Raise your Bon☆Guys in your small studio apartment!  Sell Bon☆Guys to earn cash, to buy more!  Run out of space to farm them!

Hint: Open your front door at the beginning to get your starter items.  You can then access the BonGuide with more information from your computer desk.

Created for Ludum Dare 42 - Running Out Of Space
